snippet: A former running back for the University of Montana Grizzlies football team has been sentenced to 30 years in jail.
abstract: Beau Donaldson, former running back for University of Montana football team, is sentenced to 30 years in jail for rape of childhood friend in 2010 as she slept on sofa in his apartment; case is one of several sexual assault cases and allegations that have caused controversy in Missoula, Montana, devoted football town.
lead_paragraph: A former running back for the University of Montana Grizzlies football team has been sentenced to 30 years in jail.

headline.seo: Former Montana Football Player Sentenced in Rape
